author: lveldere
body:
@davidlange6 
No need to have this in 743:
PdmV usually handles these kind of prs in private areas for 1 or more releases.

@pdmv
I made sure to maintain a ~logical correspondence between the numbers of FastSim workflows and corresponding FullSim workflows.
### The following new workflows are introduced

FullSim+PU
- QCD_FlatPt_15_3000HS_13
- SMS-T1tttt_mGl-1500_mLSP-100_13

FastSim+PU
- ZEE_13
  -TTbar_13              # already present
- H130GGgluonfusion_13
- ZTT_13
- ZMM_13
- NuGun_UP15       # already present
- QCD_FlatPt_15_3000HS_13
- SMS-T1tttt_mGl-1500_mLSP-100_13

FastSim+PU premixed
- same as for FastSim + PU
- all premix workflows are commented out as they rely on a sample that doesn't exist yet
### The following workflow are removed
- all gen-mixing based workflows 
  (gen-mixing is deprecated now)
- in time only PU workflows 
  (of no use, and they were messing up the matrix number scheme)

Originally we agree to remove these old PU workflows at a later stage,
but while making this PR I realised that would mess up the numbering scheme,
and therefore would lead to more confusion than anything else.
title: Workflows to validate FastSim in 743 for production
